[Mayor and City Council
----------------------

Find who represents you on the Grand Prairie City Council, how to participate in City Council meetings, and information on upcoming city elections](https://www.gptx.org/Government/Mayor-and-City-Council)

[City Council Meetings
---------------------

View City Council meeting schedule, agendas, and how to watch online. City Council meetings are open to the public and citizen input is welcome.](https://www.gptx.org/Government/City-Council-Meetings)

[List of city's boards and commissions, how members are selected, and how to apply](https://www.gptx.org/Government/Boards-and-Commissions)

[City Council Committee Meetings
-------------------------------

Find upcoming meetings for City Council Committees and learn more about each committee.](https://www.gptx.org/Government/City-Council-Committee-Meetings)

[You can view the City of Grand Prairie's full municipal code through the Municode website.](https://www.gptx.org/Government/Code-of-Ordinances)

[City Departments
----------------

A to Z listing of the City of Grand Prairie's Departments](https://www.gptx.org/Government/City-Departments)

[City Secretary
--------------

The City Secretary's Office administers city elections, is the custodian of city records and coordinates board and commission appointments.](https://www.gptx.org/Government/City-Secretary)

[City Manager's Office
---------------------

The City Manager’s Office runs the day-to-day business of the city, presents policy proposals for City Council consideration and carries out policy direction set by the City Council.](https://www.gptx.org/Government/City-Managers-Office)

[Find city election information and election notices.](https://www.gptx.org/Government/Elections)

[Accountability and financial transparency are priority at the City of Grand Prairie. The following financial information is provided to citizens to maintain accountability.](https://www.gptx.org/Government/Financial-Transparency)
